title: FS: NEW Low Grade 100+ Card T206 Lot  **FINAL PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Low Grade 100+ Card T206 Lot  **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards available for sale or trade. As you can see by the scans, most of these are low grade cards and are priced accordingly. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets. I collect just about everything. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

(the E95 Lord in the last scan is available for $18 as well)

Ames (slightly trimmed, horizontal crease that's tough to see in the scan) - $15
Anderson #1 (SC 350) - $12
Anderson #2 (SC 350) - $16
Bowerman (slightly trimmed but otherwise just about perfect) - $20
Casey - $13
Clancy - $13
Criger (odd color variance) - $13
Ferguson (Sovereign) - $16
Knight (Sovereign) - $17
Konetchy - $14

Manning - $14
McAleese - $13
McElveen #3 (on right) - $11

Unglaub #1 (bottom of scan, left) - $12
Unglaub #2 (bottom of scan, center) - $10

Unglaub #4 (top of scan, left) - $13
Unglaub #5 (top of scan, right - William Born back stamp) - $12
Willett - $ 11
Wiltse (Polar Bear) - $16
Three day bump.  These are priced to move quickly.  Thanks for looking!
Thanks for another great deal Marc. Its a pleasure dealing with you.
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Another bump and price drop before I send these to eBay.  I'd definitely prefer to sell them here, so these are priced to move.  Thanks for looking!
Final price drop to clear out the rest of these cards.  Thanks for looking!
